23 class VelocityController {
24 private:
25  /* double *linearTolerance; */
26  /* double *linearP; */
27  Goal goal;
28  int angularPulse;
29  flipbot2_base::flipbot2Config *config;
30  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped *transformPtr;
31  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
32  actionlib::SimpleActionServer<flipbot2_base::BotGoalAction> as_;
33  std::string action_name_;
34  geometry_msgs::Twist cmd_msg;
35  ros::Publisher pub_cmdVel =
36  nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("flipbot1/cmd_vel", 1000);
37  ros::ServiceServer service = nh_.advertiseService(
38  "add_two_ints", &VelocityController::servCallback, this);
39  geometry_msgs::Twist stop;
40  int lastDest = 3;
41  flipbot2_base::BotGoalResult result_;
42  flipbot2_base::BotGoalFeedback feedback_;
43  boost::mutex BotInteruptMutex;
49  double quatToyaw() {
50  tf::Quaternion q(
51  transformPtr->transform.rotation.x, transformPtr->transform.rotation.y,
52  transformPtr->transform.rotation.z, transformPtr->transform.rotation.w);
53  tf::Matrix3x3 m(q);
54  double roll, pitch, yaw;
55  m.getRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
56  return yaw;
57  }
58 
59 public:
60  VelocityController(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped *_transformPtr,
61  flipbot2_base::flipbot2Config *_config, std::string name)
62  : as_(nh_, name, boost::bind(&VelocityController::executeCB, this, _1),
63  false),
64  action_name_(name) {
65  transformPtr = _transformPtr;
66  angularPulse = _config->angular_pulse;
67  this->config = _config;
69  stop.linear.x = 0;
70  stop.linear.y = 0;
71  stop.angular.z = 0;
72  as_.start();
73  }
74  ~VelocityController() {
75  as_.shutdown();
76  pub_cmdVel.shutdown();
77  }
78  bool servCallback(flipbot2_base::BotInteruptRequest &req,
79  flipbot2_base::BotInteruptResponse &res) {
80  if (req.pause == 1) {
81  pub_cmdVel.publish(stop);
82  BotInteruptMutex.lock();
83  pub_cmdVel.publish(stop); // additional stop just for safety
84  ROS_INFO("Stoping the robot");
85  }
86  if (req.pause == 0) {
87  BotInteruptMutex.unlock();
88  }
89  return true;
90  }
91  void executeCB(const flipbot2_base::BotGoalGoalConstPtr &goal) {
92  ros::Rate loop_rate(20);
93  bool success = true;
94  int induct;
95  std::string goalId;
96  ROS_INFO("got the goal %i", goal->index);
97  if (goal->index > 0) {
98  induct = findInduct();
99  goalId = std::to_string(induct) + "_" + std::to_string(abs(goal->index));
100  }
101  if (goal->index < 0) {
102  induct = findNearInduct();
103  goalId = "r_" + std::to_string(induct) + "_" +
104  std::to_string(abs(goal->index));
105  }
106  ROS_INFO("Executin plan from %s", goalId.c_str());
107  auto hashFound = umap.find(goalId);
108  std::vector<Goal> waypoints = hashFound->second;
109  for (Goal goalPoint : waypoints) {
110  if (as_.isPreemptRequested() || !ros::ok()) {
111  ROS_INFO("%s: Preempted", action_name_.c_str());
112  // set the action state to preempted
113  as_.setPreempted();
114  break;
115  }
116 
117  this->setGoal(goalPoint);
118  feedback_.axis = goalPoint.axis;
119  as_.publishFeedback(feedback_);
120  ROS_INFO("Move in %c to point %i", axisToString(goalPoint.axis),
121  goalPoint.point);
122  while (!inTolerance()) {
123  cmd_msg = calculateVelocity();
124  BotInteruptMutex.lock();
125  pub_cmdVel.publish(cmd_msg);
126  BotInteruptMutex.unlock();
127  if (inTolerance()) {
128  pub_cmdVel.publish(stop);
129  break;
130  }
131  loop_rate.sleep();
132  }
133  lastDest = goal->index;
134  pub_cmdVel.publish(stop);
135  }
136  result_.destIndex = goal->index;
137  result_.inductIndex = induct;
138 
139  as_.setSucceeded(result_);
140  }
141  void setGoal(Goal _goal) { this->goal = _goal; }
150  double euclidianDistance() {
151  double _distance = 0.0;
152  /* distance = std::sqrt(pow((start - end), 2)); */
153  if (goal.axis == x)
154  _distance =
155  xPoint[goal.point - 1] - transformPtr->transform.translation.x;
156  if (goal.axis == y)
157  _distance =
158  yPoint[goal.point - 1] - transformPtr->transform.translation.y;
159  return _distance;
160  }
168  bool inTolerance() {
169  if (abs(euclidianDistance()) < config->Linear_tolerance) {
170  return true;
171  } else {
172  return false;
173  }
174  }
175  geometry_msgs::Twist calculateVelocity() {
176  geometry_msgs::Twist _twist;
177  if (goal.axis == x) {
178  double _linearVel = euclidianDistance() * config->proportional_control;
179  _twist.linear.x = _linearVel;
180  }
181  if (goal.axis == y) {
182  double _linearVel = euclidianDistance();
183  _twist.linear.y = _linearVel;
184  }
185  if (abs(quatToyaw()) > config->angular_tolerance) {
186  if (angularPulse == config->angular_pulse) {
187  /* _twist.linear.x = 0; */
188  /* _twist.linear.y = 0; */
189  _twist.angular.z =
190  quatToyaw() * config->angular_constant; // to make the robot turn
191  ROS_WARN("Out of angular tolerance"); // the opposite of yaw error
192  angularPulse = 0;
193  } else {
194  angularPulse++;
195  }
196  } else {
197  _twist.angular.z = 0;
198  }
199  return _twist;
200  }
201 
207  int findInduct() {
208  if (abs(transformPtr->transform.translation.y - yPoint[4]) < 0.3) {
209  return 1;
210  } else if (abs(transformPtr->transform.translation.y - yPoint[9]) < 0.3) {
211  return 2;
212  }
213  return 0;
214  }
215 
221  int findNearInduct() {
222  if (transformPtr->transform.translation.y < yPoint[6])
223  return 1;
224  else {
225  return 2;
226  }
227  }
228 
236  char axisToString(Axis _axis) {
237  if (_axis == x)
238  return 'x';
239  else
240  return 'y';
241  }
242 };
250 void updateTransform(geometry_msgs::TransformStamped *_transformstamped,
251  int id) {
252  tf2_ros::Buffer tfBuffer;
253  tf2_ros::TransformListener tfListener(tfBuffer);
254  while (ros::ok()) {
255  try {
256  *_transformstamped = tfBuffer.lookupTransform(
257  "world", "marker_id" + std::to_string(id), ros::Time(0));
258  } catch (tf2::TransformException &ex) {
259  ROS_WARN("%s", ex.what());
260  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
261  continue;
262  }
263  }
264 }
